data.message:
Makes me cry every year. First time I saw it was early 1990’s. 
I remember watching it with my grandad, on Xmas eve. I used to spend every Xmas with him and my Nan. They made everything about Christmas magical to me as a child. As soon as my stepdad came along, all the magic went away. 

They are bittersweet tears. Happy because of the memories. 
Sad because he’s not here and I so badly wish he was, I need him so much.

But thank you for the happy memories each year xxx
